column4: could please somebody tell me how to fix an fstab to mount my partitions in read-write mode?
defaults  should be only thing in fstab id think.. now remember that the ext3 file system supports perm so if you need access to a dir or fileyou need to chown or chmod it like you would a dir in /
you can though test by sudo mount -o remount,rw /mountpoint i guess
